title: 2008 Lunar New Year Cup
text:
The 2008 Lunar New Year Cup, officially known as Wing Lung Bank 2008 Lunar New Year Cup, is a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> tournament held in <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> on the first and fourth day of the <a href="Chinese%20New%20Year">Chinese New Year</a> of the Year of <a href="Rat%20%28zodiac%29">Rat</a> (8 January and 11 January 2008).
Format.
The two <a href="%23Semi-finals">semi-finals</a> for the four participating teams will be held on the first day of the <a href="Chinese%20New%20Year">Chinese New Year</a> of <a href="Rat%20%28zodiac%29">Rat</a> (7 February 2008). The winning teams will enter the <a href="%23Final">final</a> and the losing teams play the <a href="%23Third%20place%20match">third-place playoff</a> (Both matches on the fourth day of the Lunar New Year, i.e. 10 February 2008.) Draw in the semi-finals and third-place playoff would be settled by <a href="Penalty%20shootout%20%28association%20football%29">penalty shootout</a> directly, that means no <a href="extra%20time">extra time</a> would be played. For the final, a thirty-minute <a href="extra%20time">extra time</a> would be played after a draw. A further draw would lead to the <a href="Penalty%20shootout%20%28association%20football%29">penalty shootout</a>.
Squads.
Hajduk Split.
 
 
Hong Kong League Selection.
 
 
Peñarol.
 
 
Ulsan Hyundai.
 
Results.
"All times given in <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Time">Hong Kong Time</a> (<a href="UTC%2B8">UTC+8</a>)."
